org.mini2Dx.core

Class Geometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.Geometry

  • public class Geometry
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides pooled geometry classes. Note that this is not a thread-safe API.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_POOL_SIZE
      Default pool size.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_POOL_SIZE

        public static int DEFAULT_POOL_SIZE
        Default pool size. Modify this value before launching the game to increase the default pool sizes.
